attributes.action: Reopen GP surgeries for face to face consultations
attributes.additional_details: Order GP surgeries to resume face to face, in person consultations immediately.
attributes.background: GPs must restart seeing  patients in person. There is no reason why all other doctors can resume face to face consultations and GPs enjoy working from home while so many of us are literally dying of undetected under-treated and misdiagnosed or mismanaged conditions.

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/58770
